name: Feel the Heat (Jackson)
description:
It’s almost the weekend… It’s Friday and there’s only 4 minutes left in your shift, you begin to dream about the television you’ll watch, the snacks, the foot rests, the–... You get a call from your boss at the fire station. They demand you put out a fire in one of the houses on 66 Burnhadown Street. Will you finish the job before the end of your shift?! Or will your relaxing weekend, and the houses, burn up in flames… Hurry before it’s too late!

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Left click to spray water (must be in proximity of fire to lower the fire severity)
  • Walk over water pools to pick up water
  • Click start to begin the game
